nodes.text: The Xagobah campaign was undertaken by New Republic General Ria against an Imperial-Royalist coalition during the Galactic Civil War in 5 ABY. Ria spoke of the campaign in a meeting with members of New Republic High Command, including Fleet Admiral Gial Ackbar, Admiral Ho'ror'te, and General Hera Syndulla. Sometime later, prior to the Battle of Jakku, Ria provided a further update in another High Command meeting, detailing about the dark turn in the campaign, but expressed confidence that the operation was near its end.
